entry.title: $2654 // ALLURING MANHATTAN SKYLINE_____WATER VIEWS____FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS
entry.content:
ALLURING MANHATTAN SKYLINE_____WATER VIEWS____FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS_____SKY LOUNGE______

Listing ID #: 170101
Price: $2,654
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

High Ceilings

This beautiful 1 bedroom has Floor to Ceiling Windows ,9' & 10' Ceilings, Dark Oak Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer in Unit,GE Cafe Series Stainless Steel Appliances, Bluetooth Sound Bar Speaker System, Italian Cabinetry with Caesar Stone Countertop,Kohler Fixtures ,LED Lighting . *Net Price Advertised* NO BROKER FEE

24 Hour Doorman with Building Link Ultra-Modern Lobby with Reflecting Pool Indoor Valet Parking Garage Dry Cleaners Bicycle Storage Citi-Bike Access Terrace with Built in Game Boards SKY Amenities 41 STORIES HIGH Outdoor Heated Swimming Pool Two Level Fitness Club Landscaped Roof Deck WiFi Lounge 360 Degree Panoramic Views

Conveniently located in Downtown Brooklyn, steps away from 13 subway lines, Metrotech, the Barclays Center, Brooklyn Academy of Music (BAM), the Brooklyn Ballet, and more cultural and entertainment landmarks. Everything from Nordstrom Rack to H&M to Armani Exchange is right at your fingertips, while conveniences like grocery stores, banks, and park grounds are within steps of your front door. * Please Note Pictures May Not Be Of Exact Unit But May Be Of Similar Units*

For a private showing please call/text Sherries at 347-262-1714 or you can email me at [email protected]
